verses.verse: <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> that is over <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> him all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> to <S%H1835>Dan,<s%>

and all <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H314>hinder<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%>
and the <S%H5045>South,<s%> and the <S%H3603>Plain<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees,<s%> to <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H776>him,<s%> "This is the land which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give it to your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>' I have caused you to <S%H7200>see<s%> it with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but you shall not go over <S%H5674>there.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> Beth <S%H1047>Peor:<s%> but no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> of his <S%H6900>tomb<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4194>died:<s%> his <S%H5869>eye<s%> was not <S%H3543>dim,<s%> nor his natural <S%H3893>force<s%> <S%H5127>abated.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1065>weeping<s%> in the <S%H60>mourning<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> were <S%H8552>ended.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> was <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5564>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H1121>him:<s%> and the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H6213>him,<s%> and did as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

There has not <S%H6965>arisen<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5750>since<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face,<s%>

in all the <S%H226>signs<s%> and the <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and to all his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and to all his <S%H776>land,<s%>

and in all the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and in all the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
